# Server Rules Welcome to Echo Station! We're a high-roleplay SS14 server. This means we value the story more than the outcome. If you want to see chaos and blow things up, this is not the server for you.
## Core Rules These rules are universal and apply at [bold]all[/bold] times, including between rounds.
- [textlink="1. Admins have final say" link="EchoRuleC1"] - [textlink="2. Don't be a dick" link="EchoRuleC2"] - [textlink="3.
